alert.note: Alert for McCormick (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 27 at 4:06PM EDT until August 27 at 4:45PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: The National Weather Service in Columbia has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Lincoln County in east central Georgia... Central McCormick County in central South Carolina... * Until 445 PM EDT. * At 406 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Elijah Clark State Park, or 19 miles east of Washington, and is nearly stationary. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. * Locations impacted include... McCormick, Lincolnton, Elijah Clark State Park, Hickory Knob State Resort Park, Loce, Bordeaux, Baker Creek State Park, Knox Scout Reservation, Woodlawn, Double Branches, Modoc Boat Ramp, Hawe Creek Campground, New Hope, Long Cane Creek Picnic Area, and Modoc. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Severe thunderstorms can produce large capsizing waves and frequent lightning. If on or near Lake Strom Thurmond move away from the water and take shelter!
